entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
